{0}, {1} of {2}, has sent us a message.

Slavers based in a nearby fort have been raiding their caravans. They've asked us to destroy it, which means eliminating all enemies and turrets.

If we succeed, their relations will improve, and they'll send us this reward worth {6}:

{3}

If we don't destroy the fort in {4} days, they will do it themselves.
